pages.title: Mechanical Maestro
pages.text: The Mechanical Maestro is a block that, when powered by redstone and given an instrument, will play notes that it receives from nearby transmissions.$(br2)The Mechanical Maestro must have its own Switchboard; If the provided instrument has a Switchboard inside of it that Switchboard will be ignored.

pages.title: Properties
pages.text: Mechanical Maestros use the following $(l:3_2properties)Switchboard Properties$():$(br2)- Transmission Source$(br)- MIDI Channels
